participant_1.background:
I used to be very outgoing, but now I prefer to keep to myself.
i have three children.
I enjoy writing my dreams down because they often tell me a lot about myself.
i work for peta.
i m going back to school.

participant_2.background:
I collect memories of my best friend from out of town.
i am dating my boss.
i work as a freelance accountant.
i got hired as a security guard.
I wake up and start my day with a positive attitude, listening to music that motivates me to keep pushing forward.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
I am doing great today! How about you?
Pretty good. I am just going back to school to change careers.
Wow, that is exciting! What are you going to study?
I am going to study accounting. I want to work as a freelance accountant.
That is awesome! I am a freelance accountant myself.
Really? That is awesome! What do you like about it?
I like the flexibility of it. I can work from home and set my own hours.
That is great! I am looking forward to it.
I am sure you will do great!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to collect memories of my best friend from out of town.
That is a really neat hobby!
Thank you! I also like to wake up and start my day with a positive attitude, listening to music that motivates me to keep pushing forward.
That is a great way to start your day!
